reviewText: This movie was excellent it moved my heart, I cried, screamed, laughed and enjoyed it very much, it is a very emotional move. I recommend watching this one....
I enjoyed every minute of this movie.  This movie really gives you a dose of reality.  No one should ever be underestimated.
Awesome, awesome, awesome!  Phenomenal!  I loved it!  Such a wonderfully written story and well-performed film with such great actors.  Highly recommended to watch!

I love this movie for several reasons. Not in a particular order, the actors were magnificent.  Mr. Cheatham promising performance humanized his character and  was able to make the audience sympathize for his character even though his actions toward his faithful fiance were harsh.  One of my favorite scenes was his self~reflecting talk in the mirror and the scene where he has a crazy walk up the street.  The ex~boyfriend was hilarious.  Much love to the actors, the directors and all supporting staff!

This was an AMAZING film on domestic violence. Regardless of it being a low-budget film, it had great cinematography, a talented cast and the most important part, a great message for everyone to follow. I would watch their movies anytime!
i guess this was a low budget film, but even so it could have been better.  i did not enjoy this film.

This was a great movie starting from the Director,editors, producers and actors! I hope more ppl in bigger places really start to take a look at the talented actors/directors in Atlanta and all over the US on the independent level. Audiences are wanting and waiting to see new and talented faces in the industry. BLESS!
